import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import "./popular_slide.css" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { popularMovies } from "../../store/popular"; const PopularSlide = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(()=> { dispatch(popularMovies()) },[dispatch]) const popular = useSelector(state => state.popular); return (
